verses.verse: Now these are the words<WH1697> of the letter<WH5612> that Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030> sent<WH7971> from Jerusalem<WH3389> unto the residue<WH3499> of the elders<WH2205> of the captivity<WH1473>, and to the priests<WH3548>, and to the prophets<WH5030>, and to all the people<WH5971>, whom Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> had carried away captive<WH1540> from Jerusalem<WH3389> to Babylon<WH894>,

(after <WH310> that Jeconiah<WH3204> the king<WH4428>, and the queen-mother<WH1377>, and the eunuchs<WH5631>, and the princes<WH8269> of Judah<WH3063> and Jerusalem<WH3389>, and the craftsmen<WH2796>, and the smiths<WH4525>, were departed<WH3318> from Jerusalem<WH3389>,)

by the hand<WH3027> of Elasah<WH501> the son<WH1121> of Shaphan<WH8227>, and Gemariah<WH1587> the son<WH1121> of Hilkiah<WH2518>, (whom Zedekiah<WH6667> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> sent<WH7971> unto Babylon<WH894> to Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>,) saying<WH559>,

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, unto all the captivity<WH1540>, whom I have caused to be carried away captive<WH1473> from Jerusalem<WH3389> unto Babylon<WH894>:
Build <WH1129> ye houses<WH1004>, and dwell<WH3427> in them<WH5193>; and plant gardens<WH1593>, and eat<WH398> the fruit of them<WH6529>.

Take <WH3947> ye wives<WH802>, and beget<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1323>; and take<WH3947> wives<WH802> for your sons<WH1121>, and give<WH5414> your daughters<WH1323> to husbands<WH582>, that they may bear<WH3205> sons<WH1121> and daughters<WH1121>; and multiply<WH7235> ye there<WH4591>, and be not diminished.

And seek<WH1875> the peace<WH7965> of the city<WH5892> whither I have caused you to be carried away captive<WH1540>, and pray<WH6419> unto Jehovah<WH3068> for it<WH7965>; for in the peace thereof shall ye have peace<WH7965>.

For thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>: Let not your prophets<WH5030> that are in the midst<WH7130> of you<WH7080>, and your diviners, deceive<WH5377> you<WH8085>; neither hearken ye to your dreams<WH2472> which ye cause to be dreamed<WH2492>.
For they prophesy<WH5012> falsely<WH8267> unto you in my name<WH8034>: I have not sent<WH7971> them<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>.

For thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, After<WH6310> seventy<WH7657> years<WH8141> are accomplished<WH4390> for Babylon<WH894>, I will visit<WH6485> you<WH6965>, and perform my good<WH2896> word<WH1697> toward you<WH7725>, in causing you to return to this place<WH4725>.

For I know<WH3045> the thoughts<WH4284> that I think<WH2803> toward you<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>, thoughts<WH4284> of peace<WH7965>, and not of evil<WH7451>, to give<WH5414> you hope in your latter<WH8615> end<WH319>.
And ye shall call<WH7121> upon me<WH1980>, and ye shall go and pray<WH6419> unto me<WH8085>, and I will hearken unto you.
And ye shall seek<WH1245> me<WH4672>, and find me<WH1875>, when ye shall search for me with all your heart<WH3824>.

And I will be found<WH4672> of you<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>, and I will turn again<WH7725> your captivity<WH7622>, and I will gather<WH6908> you from all the nations<WH1471>, and from all the places<WH4725> whither I have driven<WH5080> you<WH5002>, saith Jehovah<WH3068>; and I will bring you again<WH7725> unto the place<WH4725> whence I caused you to be carried away captive<WH1540>.
Because ye have said<WH559>, Jehovah<WH3068> hath raised us up<WH6965> prophets<WH5030> in Babylon<WH894>;

thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> concerning the king<WH4428> that sitteth<WH3427> upon the throne<WH3678> of David<WH1732>, and concerning all the people<WH5971> that dwell<WH3427> in this city<WH5892>, your brethren<WH251> that are not gone forth<WH3318> with you into captivity<WH1473>;

thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>; Behold<WH7971>, I will send upon them the sword<WH2719>, the famine<WH7458>, and the pestilence<WH1698>, and will make<WH5414> them like vile<WH8182> figs<WH8384>, that cannot be eaten<WH398>, they are so bad<WH7455>.

And I will pursue<WH7291> after them<WH310> with the sword<WH2719>, with the famine<WH7458>, and with the pestilence<WH1698>, and will deliver<WH5414> them to be tossed<WH2189> to and fro among all the kingdoms<WH4467> of the earth<WH776>, to be an execration<WH423>, and an astonishment<WH8047>, and a hissing<WH8322>, and a reproach<WH2781>, among all the nations<WH1471> whither I have driven them<WH5080>;

because they have not hearkened<WH8085> to my words<WH1697>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, wherewith I sent<WH7971> unto them my servants<WH5650> the prophets<WH5030>, rising up early<WH7925> and sending<WH7971> them<WH8085>; but ye would not hear, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
Hear <WH8085> ye therefore the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068>, all ye of the captivity<WH1473>, whom I have sent<WH7971> away from Jerusalem<WH3389> to Babylon<WH894>.

Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, concerning Ahab<WH256> the son<WH1121> of Kolaiah<WH6964>, and concerning Zedekiah<WH6667> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah<WH4641>, who prophesy<WH5012> a lie<WH8267> unto you in my name<WH8034>: Behold<WH5414>, I will deliver them into the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadrezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894>; and he shall slay<WH5221> them before your eyes<WH5869>;

and of them shall be taken up<WH3947> a curse<WH7045> by all the captives<WH1546> of Judah<WH3063> that are in Babylon<WH894>, saying<WH559>, Jehovah<WH3068> make<WH7760> thee like Zedekiah<WH6667> and like Ahab<WH256>, whom the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> roasted<WH7033> in the fire<WH784>;

because they have wrought<WH6213> folly<WH5039> in Israel<WH3478>, and have committed<WH6213> adultery<WH5003> with their neighbors<WH7453>' wives<WH802>, and have spoken<WH1696> words<WH1697> in my name<WH8034> falsely<WH8267>, which I commanded<WH6680> them not<WH3045>; and I am he that knoweth, and am witness<WH5707>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>.
And concerning Shemaiah<WH8098> the Nehelamite<WH5161> thou shalt speak<WH559>, saying<WH559>,

Thus speaketh<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635>, the God<WH430> of Israel<WH3478>, saying<WH559>, Because thou hast sent<WH7971> letters<WH5612> in thine own name<WH8034> unto all the people<WH5971> that are at Jerusalem<WH3389>, and to Zephaniah<WH6846> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah<WH4641>, the priest<WH3548>, and to all the priests<WH3548>, saying<WH559>,

Jehovah <WH3068> hath made<WH5414> thee priest<WH3548> in the stead of Jehoiada<WH3077> the priest<WH3548>, that there may be officers<WH6496> in the house<WH1004> of Jehovah<WH3068>, for every man<WH376> that is mad<WH7696>, and maketh himself a prophet<WH5012>, that thou shouldest put<WH5414> him in the stocks<WH6729> and in shackles<WH4115>.
Now therefore<WH1605>, why hast thou not rebuked Jeremiah<WH3414> of Anathoth<WH6069>, who maketh himself a prophet to you<WH5012>,

forasmuch as he hath sent<WH7971> unto us in Babylon<WH894>, saying<WH559>, The<WH1931> captivity is long<WH752>: build<WH1129> ye houses<WH1004>, and dwell<WH3427> in them<WH5193>; and plant gardens<WH1593>, and eat<WH398> the fruit of them<WH6529>?
And Zephaniah<WH6846> the priest<WH3548> read<WH7121> this letter<WH5612> in the ears<WH241> of Jeremiah<WH3414> the prophet<WH5030>.
Then came the word<WH1697> of Jehovah<WH3068> unto Jeremiah<WH3414>, saying<WH559>,

Send <WH7971> to all them of the captivity<WH1473>, saying<WH559>, Thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068> concerning Shemaiah<WH8098> the Nehelamite<WH5161>: Because that Shemaiah<WH8098> hath prophesied<WH5012> unto you<WH7971>, and I sent him not<WH982>, and he hath caused you to trust in a lie<WH8267>;

therefore thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, Behold<WH6485>, I will punish Shemaiah<WH8098> the Nehelamite<WH5161>, and his seed<WH2233>; he shall not have a man<WH376> to dwell<WH3427> among<WH8432> this people<WH5971>, neither shall he behold<WH7200> the good<WH2896> that I will do<WH6213> unto my people<WH5971>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, because he hath spoken<WH1696> rebellion<WH5627> against Jehovah<WH3068>.
